page.title: 20DATA COLLECTION
page.content: The Domesday team comprised twenty eight twelve to thirteen year old pupils and two teachers (ages not disclosed !). Groups consisted of four or five pupils each taking responsibility for two individual one kilometre squares. Data collection was made complicated as our D_Block was some distance from our school and this caused difficulties of transportation. Questionnaires were devised, tape recordings taken, formal letters written, telephone calls made and personal interviews arranged to enable us to gather all the necessary information. The success of our survey has been partly due to the very willing help we have received from many people in our area.
